```{r pointssegment, cache = TRUE}
plot(pointssegment(xbegin=0, ybegin=0, xend=10, yend=10))

                   xjitteramount=2,yjitteramount=2))

                   xjitteramount=2,yjitteramount=2,bezier=FALSE))
```
